name: Arkapygame v. 11.1
description:
This is an updated version of the game (8-7-2020) and it's very fun. You can play to 5 different version of this Arkanoid / Breakout inspired game.

Now:

- the ball goes faster or slower, depending on time and score

- the score works correctly

- there is a different layout for all the games

- Levels are now nicer

- When the bar is hitten it goes litterally on fire

https://pythonprogramming.altervista.org
